snippet.title: Curious Expedition 2 - Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
Curious Expedition 2 is out now on Steam: https://s.team/a/1040230/

Available on Nintendo Switch too: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/curious-expedition-2-switch/

Coming to Playstation and Xbox in early 2022. A series of DLCs for all platforms are also in the works.

Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/maschinen-mensch

Official website: https://curious-expedition.com

Published by Thunderful https://www.thunderfulgames.com

#CuriousExpedition2
